description:
In this video-based course and learn how to design and build out your smart home from scratch using Nest smart home automation products.

In the course Gerard teaches you how add Nest smart learning thermostats, smart fire & CO monoxide detectors and security cameras to your family home.

Finally we wrap up with details on how to integrate Nest with dozens of other third party smart home automation devices.

Please note that the Nest smart home platform is new and evolving. Therefore, customers who purchase the video course will receive updates to co-incide with Nest refinements taking place over the coming months and indeed years!
title: How to Build a Smart Home Automation System Using Nest
